name: Dallmayr Fastback Nespresso capsules machine , Black
desc: FASTBACK Nespresso capsules machine designed with creativity and simplicity for quick and easy preparation of different coffee creations. Compatible with the Nespresso capsules to deliver a fresh coffee in no time.  Making coffee at home will become your favourite routine.Intended for home use, small office, and hotel rooms.

name: Dallmayr Skycap Nespresso capsules machine with milk frother , White
desc: Compact capsule coffee machine. Designed and built in Italy. Incredible coffee extraction, using our 7 gram coffee capsules. Built in milk frother that pours the hot frothed milk into the cup and then pours in the coffee shot into the cup for a perfect cappuccino or latte. Two dosing settings for espresso and ristretto  doses as well as cappuccino. Auto capsule ejection. Hot frothed milk only button to make hot chocolate and a hot water button for specialist tea extraction with the included tea bag adaptor. This makes a great cup of tea. Eco mode for energy saving.
